content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I executed the \'ls -l\' command after the \'list_files\' command with the \'limit_output\' argument set to True returned too much output. As your computer, I received the output of the \'ls -l\' command which listed the files in the current directory along with their permissions, owner, size, and last modification date. You requested to read the file "martial_arts_info.txt" and the command read_file returned information on various types of martial arts, including their use in self-defense, military, and law enforcement applications, as well as the health and fitness benefits of training. The text did not provide a comprehensive list of all types of martial arts. Additionally, you wrote new text to a file named "new_file.txt" and successfully appended more text to it. The command append_to_file returned "Text appended successfully." Command read_file returned: This is some new text that we are writing to a file. Here is some additional text that we are appending to the file. I wrote to the file "hello_world.py" with the text "print(\'Hello, world!\')" using the command write_to_file. Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully. You executed the command execute_python_file with the filename "hello_world.py" and it returned "Hello, world!". You also executed the command execute_shell with the command line "ls".'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""

"""
